Control Name: SA-15 DEVELOPMENT PROCESS, STANDARDS, AND TOOLS
Control Statement: The organization: a. Requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to follow a documented development process that:1. Explicitly addresses security requirements;2. Identifies the standards and tools used in the development process;3. Documents the specific tool options and tool configurations used in the development process; and4. Documents, manages, and ensures the integrity of changes to the process and/or tools used in development; andb. Reviews the development process, standards, tools, and tool options/configurations [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] to determine if the process, standards, tools, and tool options/configurations selected and employed can satisfy [Assignment: organization-defined security requirements].
